Organism identifiers from the Orthologous Matrix

Source: R/oma.R
oma_organisms.Rd

Organism identifiers from the Orthologous Matrix

Usage

oma_organisms()

Value

A data frame with organism identifiers.

See also

ensembl_organisms

Examples

oma_organisms()
#> # A tibble: 2,565 × 5
#>    oma_code ncbi_tax_id latin_name                     genome_source oma_version

#>  5 ACEAZ         574087 Acetohalobium arabaticum (str… EBI           09-JAN-201…
#>  6 ACECE         720554 Acetivibrio clariflavus (stra… EBI           23-JUL-201…
#>  7 ACEMN         891968 Acetomicrobium mobile (strain… EBI           23-JUL-201…
#>  8 ACEP3         634452 Acetobacter pasteurianus (str… Genome Revie… 24-NOV-200…
#>  9 ACESD         499177 Acetoanaerobium sticklandii (… EBI           15-OCT-201…
